'''Primal Sandglasses''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Great Red Sand]], [[Sumeru]] found in the Ruins of King Deshret.

They can be flipped once touched to mark time. Rotate all the nearby Primal Sandglasses before the time limit (usually 30 second per rotation) is reached to complete the puzzle. Some Primal Sandglass puzzles need to be fully revealed using [[Replicator Keystone]]s before they can be activated.

Primal Sandglasses near the cliff of [[Khaj-Nisut]] and at [[Aaru's Shut]] instead act like an [[Clusterleaf of Cultivation]] when activated, but the spawned [[Four-Leaf Sigil]]s only last for 30 seconds.
